ruling: - The second part of this card's effect targets 2 cards on the opponent's side of the field. If the opponent chains a card to remove 1 of the 2 targets, the other targeted card is still destroyed.

- [[Goldd, Wu-Lord of Dark World]] must be Special Summoned to resolve the second part of his effect. If you cannot Summon him because you activated [[Scapegoat]] that turn, or your Monster Card Zones are full, then the second part of his effect does not resolve.
- If the Special Summon of [[Goldd, Wu-Lord of Dark World]] is negated with [[Royal Oppression]], the second part of his effect does not resolve.

- If [[Goldd, Wu-Lord of Dark World]] is discarded by your opponent's card effect, when his effect resolves, he is Special Summoned first, and then the second part of his effect resolves. So the opponent cannot activate [[Bottomless Trap Hole]] or [[Torrential Tribute]]; the timing is no longer correct. Also, you could not draw a card for the effect of [[Card of Safe Return]].
- If monsters are targeted by [[Goldd, Wu-Lord of Dark World]], the opponent can chain [[My Body as a Shield]].
- If at least 1 Trap Card is targeted by [[Goldd, Wu-Lord of Dark World]], then the opponent can chain [[Fake Trap]] and the targeted Trap Card(s) will not be destroyed.
- The effects of this card are Trigger Effects that can be chained to.

- These effects only activate if the card is discarded by a card effect. They will not activate if discarded for the cost of a card like [[Lightning Vortex]], [[Raigeki Break]], [[Tribe-Infecting Virus]], or [[Infernal Incinerator]]. They will not activate if sent to the graveyard by a card effect like [[Last Turn]] or [[Chaos Emperor Dragon - Envoy of the End]].
- If this card is discarded by your opponentâ€™s card effect, both parts of its effect resolve in a single chain link. If [[Divine Wrath]] is chained to its effects, it will negate both parts.
- The effects of this card activate in the Graveyard, so [[Skill Drain]] will not negate these effects.
- These effects can activate in the Damage Step, if discarded by the effect of a card like [[Don Zaloog]].

- If this card is discarded by a card effect in the middle of a chain, or in the middle of a card effect like [[Dragged Down into the Grave]], its effects will activate after the current chain resolves. They cannot miss the timing.
- If this card is discarded from your hand by a card effect while [[Macro Cosmos]] is on the field, its effects will not activate because it was not discarded to the Graveyard.
